summary: Can I ask you all something?
body:
Can I ask you all something?

Sooo I want to ask everyone something and I want everyone’s honest opinion please.

So my ex boyfriend Drew and I broke up on Wednesday after being together for over two years. The relationship was very toxic and he was extremely controlling and kept accusing me of cheating from the beginning and never changed his behavior in two years.

I cried a lot when it happened and on the way home then I didn’t for the rest of the day cuz I finally felt free. Hours and hours later I messaged my old high school boyfriend Jesse. All I said was hi and that it is amazing that he is gunna try to audition for Captain Marvel and the conversation continued from there. We ended up hanging out that day at the mall then we walked to our high school and sat on the bleachers and talked some more, then when it started to rain we ran to one of the benches by the high school and talked in the rain until we got picked up.

I was so happy and I couldn’t stop smiling. We have been hanging out a lot recently and my parents are worried I am going to rush into a new relationship when that isn’t the case at all. Jesse knows I don’t wanna date yet but we are still gunna see each other, go on dates, and get to know each other from scratch which I’ve never done before.

My cousin and my friend got out of toxic relationships and started talking to their now current boyfriends the same day they ended their toxic relationship. All my friends say it’s not bad that I’m talking to another guy that makes me happy since my happiness matters so much but my parents are just worried that I’ll rush into it and not give myself time to work on myself as well.

I can see him while also working on myself but I am not ready to date and he is completely fine with that. There are strong feelings between us and every time I’m with him I’m extremely happy, happier then I’ve been in two years.

I would just like to ask you guys if that moving on fast from a toxic relationship to a new guy that makes you feel happy and appreciated is a good thing.

My parents keep making me second guess myself and I would just like more people’s opinion on this!

summary: Una heroína de tallas grandes tendrá su propia película de acción
title: Una heroína de tallas grandes tendrá su propia película de acción
body:
Después de que DC y Warner abrieran el camino a las superheroínas protagonistas dirigidas por una mujer con el tremendo éxito de Wonder Woman, y que Marvel prometiera la inclusión de personajes representativos de la comunidad LGBT, ahora será el turno de la igualdad física con la primera heroína de tallas grandes.

Se trata de Faith, la superheroína de la casa de comics Valiant (la misma de Bloodshot que también tiene un acuerdo con Sony para hacer una película con Vin Diesel), que debutará en el cine de acción de la mano del productor de Fast & Furious, Neil Moritz para Sony Pictures.

El personaje, creado por Jim Shooter y David Lapham, apareció por primera vez en 1992. Su nombre es Faith Herbert, una joven que creció con su abuela tras la muerte de sus padres. Una nerd encantadora con sobrepeso, feliz y apasionada por las series de Joss Whedon como Buffy, y con poderes especiales como la telequinesis y el vuelo.

De momento, el proyecto no tiene director asignado pero sí sabemos gracias a Deadline que han fichado a Maria Melnik para escribir el guion, la misma guionista que escribió los libretos de varios episodios de American Gods.

Para seguir leyendo:
Evangeline Lilly se burla de todos los hombres de Marvel que se quejan de sus vestuarios ajustados ¡y nos encanta!
‘Wonder Woman 1984’: Mira la primera imagen de Kristen Wiig como Cheetah
¿Puede el sable de Luke Skywalker destruir el escudo de Capitán América? ¡Mark Hamill y Chris Evans encienden el debate!

summary: D*nvers hate has less to do with the MCU fandom than the comic canon where she's a bigger fascist than St*rk. She's probably...
question: D*nvers hate has less to do with the MCU fandom than the comic canon where she's a bigger fascist than St*rk. She's probably gonna tank the MCU unless they keep her older, fun personality verses the current one. She used to be fun in the comics though, before Civil War II.
answer:
Well, I’m not very familiar with her or her comics, gonna be honest ! I know of her origin story, and that’s pretty much it. I haven’t heard good things about Civil War II,  I know that she seems to gain authority over every superhero in the end, so I get where you’re coming from.

I wouldn’t worry too much about the MCU going with her canon comic personality though, even with how little we know about the movie, they’re definetely going with ther origin story (how she gets her powers etc) for her first solo movie. And the MCU always adds some humour in their movies.

summary: Νέες σκηνές από το Ant-Man & The Wasp λίγο πριν την πρεμιέρα
title: Νέες σκηνές από το Ant-Man & The Wasp λίγο πριν την πρεμιέρα
body:
Στις 5 Ιουλίου κάνει πρεμιέρα η νέα ταινία της Marvel: Ant-Man and The Wasp και έχουμε την ευκαιρία να δούμε ένα νέο clip με τον villain Ghost.

Σε αυτό, η Evangeline Lilly είναι σε πλήρη δράση, όπως μας είχε προϊδεάσει από την post credit σκηνή της πρώτης ταινίας. Και όπως φαίνεται, θα μπορούσε να είναι μια χαρά προσθήκη στους Avengers. Να θυμίσουμε ότι τόσο η Captain Marvel (όχι με την Brie Larson), όσο και η Wasp ήταν στο τσακ να εμφανιστούν σαν cameo στο Age Of Ultron, μετά από πιέσεις του Joss Whedon.

summary: If I don’t get Wanda and Carol interacting in Avengers 4, I will riot
body:
If I don’t get Wanda and Carol interacting in Avengers 4, I will riot

I need a scene where Carol travels through time and space or however to get into the soul stone and find Wanda.

And she holds her shoulders (IF NOT HER CHEEKS) and tells her they need her back on Earth and that she’s ‘SO strong (because of everything she’s been put through)’ and when Wanda shows doubt in her eyes Carol continues that she’s ‘more powerful than she knows.’

And Wanda’s like, ‘what do you need me to do?’

And then they return to Earth and kick ass together and save the universe

Because their friendship in the comics is so awesome, and we need that on screen, and also because Wanda is so underrated

AND THEN THEY BECOME GIRLFRIENDS
